p: Antimicrobial activity testing of the compound 212 was carried out against a set of microorganisms using paper-disk diffusion assay. 212 exerted moderate-high activities (13 mm, 16 mm, 15 mm, 10 mm, 11 mm and 14 mm) against Staphylococcus aureus, Pseudomonas aeruginosa, Candida albicans, Saccharomyces cerevisiae, Bacillus cereus and Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633. Gentamycin was used as positive control with the diameter of agar diffusion of 22 mm, 18 mm, 17 mm, 23 mm, 20 mm and 18 mm against the 5 bacteria as mentioned above [ 68].
